trans-unit.source: The <see cref="N:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization" /> namespace provides types that support customization and control of serialization at design time.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="N:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization" /> 命名空間提供的型別支援在設計階段時序列化 (Serialization) 的自訂與控制。

trans-unit.source: The classes in this namespace can be divided into the following categories:
trans-unit.target: 此命名空間中的類別可以分成下列類別：

trans-unit.source: Serialization attributes that can be used to indicate the serializer to use for a specific type: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.DesignerSerializerAttribute>, to indicate the serializer to use for a particular type; and <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.RootDesignerSerializerAttribute>, to indicate the base serializer to use for the root designer.
trans-unit.target: 序列化屬性，可用於指出要用於特定類型的序列化程式： <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.DesignerSerializerAttribute>，表示為特定的類型; 使用的序列化程式和<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.RootDesignerSerializerAttribute>，以表示根目錄設計工具所使用的基底序列化程式。

trans-unit.source: Classes that a designer can implement to customize serialization: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderHost>, for loading a designer document from a serialized state; and <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService>, for loading a designer document when external components and asynchronous loading are involved.
trans-unit.target: 設計工具可以實作自訂序列化的類別： <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderHost>，從已序列化的狀態; 載入設計工具的文件和<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService>，牽涉到外部元件與非同步載入時，載入設計工具的文件。

trans-unit.source: Interfaces that a designer can use to manage the serialization process: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager>, to register or retrieve custom serializers; <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationProvider>, to make a serializer available to an <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager>; and <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationService>, which provides methods to invoke serialization and deserialization.
trans-unit.target: 介面的設計工具可用來管理序列化處理序： <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager>，以註冊或擷取自訂的序列化程式。<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationProvider>、 要序列化程式提供給<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager>; 和<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationService>，這樣會提供方法來叫用序列化和還原序列化。

trans-unit.source: An interface that can be implemented to customize the loading process of a designer: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.DesignerLoader>.
trans-unit.target: 介面可以實作自訂的設計工具載入程序： <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.DesignerLoader>。

trans-unit.source: An interface that can be used to optimize the reloading of a designer: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.ICodeDomDesignerReload>.
trans-unit.target: 可用來最佳化重新載入設計工具的介面： <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.ICodeDomDesignerReload>。

trans-unit.source: Other helper classes: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.INameCreationService>, an interface for generating unique names for objects; <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.ContextStack>, a data structure useful for sharing serialization context information with serializers; and <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.InstanceDescriptor>, an object that can describe a serializable object.
trans-unit.target: 其他協助程式類別： <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.INameCreationService>，產生物件的唯一名稱的介面<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.ContextStack>，適用於與序列化程式; 共用序列化內容資訊的資料結構和<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.InstanceDescriptor>，可描述可序列化的物件的物件。
